title: iPhone X Teardown! - Screen and Battery Replacement shown in 5 minutes
description: Watch as I show the teardown of my new iPhone X in 5 minutes. Fix your iPhone yourself with repair guides and parts from iFixit!:  Replacing the screen of an iPhone X is a bit more simple than previous iPhones. There is less hardware to transfer over from the broken screen to the new screen. Apple has made things a bit easier with the removal of that fingerprint scanner.   The iPhone X battery replacement is also relatively easy with its magical pull tabs holding it down. It is one of the most uniquely shaped batteries that ive ever seen!
